flavorText: After fear and weakness rot away, that which remains is stronger than its living form.

foreignData.flavorText: Una vez que el miedo y la debilidad se pudren, lo que queda es mucho más fuerte que su forma viva.

name: Vigor Mortis
originalText: Return target creature card from your graveyard to play. If {G} was spent to play Vigor Mortis, that creature comes into play with a +1/+1 counter on it.

rulings.text: The +1/+1 counter from this ability is in addition to any other counters the creature enters the battlefield with.

text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. If {G} was spent to cast this spell, that creature enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.
